WORK EXPERIENCE

IT Modernization John Deere Global IT 2017-current

  • Created the strategy for execution of the global IT initiative around modernizing our development and applications across the enterprise in Cloud, UX, Agile/Lean, and Security
  • Formed and managed a team in Pune India to execute modernization strategy across global IT India
  • Established a dojo center in both of our development offices in Moline, Illinois and Pune, India
  • Coached teams, leaders, and other coaches on patterns for how to work as a team, use Kanban and Scrum, define and refine a backlog, use story mapping, value stream mapping, and agile principles to drive more value delivery

DevOps Enablement Team Lead JD Intelligent Solutions Group (ISG) 2015-2017

  • Commonized CI pipelines across ISG by creating a new CI tool for cloud and mobile apps which built a boilerplate “pipeline builder” in Jenkins and simplified continuous delivery for applications while being audit/security compliant
  • Created strategy for release management driving deployment cadence across ISG down to weekly from 2 months for distributed applications, including some applications with connections to the mainframe
  • Established coding and development standards for ISG by building the Unicorn Dashboard – a tool for investigating and reporting development practices by team

Infrastructure Team Lead JD Intelligent Solutions Group (ISG) 2013-2015

  • Built a team around the non-existing function of test integration for infrastructure components
  • Established patterns for applying the test pyramid to back-end components including APIs, external dependencies, and our in-field telematics device communication
  • Separated the back-end of our application infrastructure into distinct deployable components (segregated by application responsibility e.g. internal comms, external comms, data retrieval, data processing, etc.) which reduced deployment cadence from quarterly releases to biweekly releases

Systems Integration Lead John Deere Field Connect 2012-2013

  • Led the transformation from 2-3 week regression testing cycles to 2-3 day regression cycles for software releases
  • Built and tested the fieldconnect.deere.com site for displaying soil moisture data to farmers via in field telematics systems

Systems Engineer/Project Manager Medix Dental 2011-2012

  • Worked with practice management software companies to deploy new versions of their software
  • Implemented lean service management practices to manage customer tickets

Producer Budcat Creations/Activision 2008-2010

  • Managed cross functional teams of software engineers, designers, and artists
  • Launched Budcat’s first full game development cycle using Scrum
  • Produced Guitar Hero Metallica (Wii and PS2), Guitar Hero 5 (PS2), Band Hero (PS2), and Top Shot Arcade (Wii)

Manager - Various Best Buy, Target 2000-2008
